snippet: Jared L. Loughner pleaded guilty on Tuesday to carrying out a shooting rampage that left six people dead, including Gabrielle Giffords. In exchange, the government has agreed not to seek the death penalty.
lead_paragraph: Jared L. Loughner pleaded guilty on Tuesday to carrying out a shooting rampage that left six people dead, including Gabrielle Giffords. In exchange, the government has agreed not to seek the death penalty.

headline.main: Loughner Pleads Guilty in 2011 Tucson Shootings
